Member Function Documentation

void CTControlFrameView::DrawControlFrame (  const Control &  control,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, virtual]
 

Draws the data of a frame described by the model. Must be implemented in the corresponding theme view.

Parameters:
model Model describing the data of a frame.
dc Pointer to the device context, where the drawing should be done.
repaint_rect Rectangle which indicates, where the repainting must be done.

Implements ControlFrameView.

void CTControlFrameView::SetDimensions (  XYDIM  left_size,
XYDIM  top_size,
XYDIM  right_size,
XYDIM  bottom_size
) 
 

APOXI-Internal method.

This method sets the dimensions (left, right, top, bottom sizes). It is called by CustomizableTheme from its Update(...) method. It shouldn't be necessary for application programmers to use it.
